price: Sεdeε wode bεbͻ amanfoͻ a yɛammͻ wͻn agyanom kͻkͻ no a, enti wͻn werε afri (wͻn ho) no kͻkͻ.
arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: litundhira qawman mā undhira ābāuhum fahum ghāfilūna
